casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2002-0050. Schottenstein v. Schottenstein.

Franklin App. Nos. 00AP-1088, 00AP-1284, 01AP-227, 01AP-36, 01AP-94 and 01AP-95. Reported at 98 Ohio St.3d 1210, 2003-Ohio-1088, 784 N.E.2d 1182. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent. William G. Batchelder, J., of the Ninth Appellate District, sitting for Cook, J.
